name: Quantum Computing Walk-through
content:
// This example demonstrates principles of quantum computing. // VectorSize 8 SetViewMode 2 Display "

The square surface represents
256 states of 8 qbits." Delay 3000 Delay 1 Display "

Initial state of quantum register is state 0
with no other states contributing." Delay 3000 Delay 1 Display "

Hadamard gate creates superposition
of states 0 and 1 for given qbit (here 2)." Hadamard 2 Delay 1000 Hadamard 2 Delay 1000 Hadamard 2 Delay 1000 Delay 1 Display "

SigmaX gate (quantum not) flips states 0 and 1
for given qbit (here 0)." SigmaX 0 Delay 1000 SigmaX 0 Delay 1000 SigmaX 0 Delay 1000 Delay 1
